posts.post_title: T206 Cobb Red Portrait SGC 40 Sale/Trade *SOLD*
posts.post_content:
If interested in purchasing or trading, please send me a PM or email at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].  The price below includes delivery.  For trade, I am looking for Cobb Green Portrait or T206 rare backs (Lenox, Red Hindu, Uzit).  Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions, comments or concerns.

Cobb Red Portrait SGC 40 [STRIKE]$1585[/STRIKE] *SOLD*
